name: Jules
description: Google's autonomous AI coding agent that handles development tasks developers don't want to do, including bug fixing, version bumps, test writing, and feature building. Jules works asynchronously, allowing developers to focus on core coding while the agent manages routine tasks.
community_quotes: Jules lets you focus on the coding you want to do, meanwhile picking up all the other random tasks that you rather not do
An autonomous agent that gets out of your way and handles the coding tasks you don't want to do
Jules does coding tasks you don't want to do - from bug fixing to feature building
Google's entry into the competitive AI developer tools market alongside products like GitHub Copilot
